relation: Darrow - #61 Orange Kid appears in all of his juicy glory. Unfortunately for Ness, he's about to learn a lesson in lending fruit kids money to make crazy inventions. A lesson that we all should learn at one point in our lives.
Darrow - #60 With Everdred knocked out of the picture, Ness can now continue...but to where? When in doubt, check the player's guide!
Darrow - #59 One man... One boy... One exit mouse... Who will win?! Who will knit its brow?! Let the battle begin!..er, and end.
Darrow - #58 Everdred brings the funk in a way that only a short wild fat man can. Once the stage is set, the horns lock and the rock begins to roll.
Darrow - #57 Exit mouse's wicked ways come back to haunt him...or, actually, Ness. Harold, the New Age Retro Hippie, approaches and leaves Ness with tales that will scar him for life.
